plot: A feature length making of documentary about Galaxy of Terror, featuring 22 interviews with original members of the cast and crew.
title: Tales from the Lumber Yard: The Making of Galaxy of Terror
plot_es: A feature length making of documentary about Galaxy of Terror, featuring 22 interviews with original members of the cast and crew.
original_name: Tales from the Lumber Yard: The Making of Galaxy of Terror
plot_en: A feature length making of documentary about Galaxy of Terror, featuring 22 interviews with original members of the cast and crew.
